تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop, 

I hope you're doing well!  

I wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding TechnePlus and our distinguished capabilities with Boomi. Our expertise in transforming integrations and automating processes can help your organization overcome data silos and enhance efficiency. We have some great success stories with Fortune 500 clients that I’d love to share and propose to replicate.

I hope you available for a brief chat this week or next to discuss our capabilities to meet your unique needs. Let me know what time suits you best will arrange our discussion accordingly.

Looking forward to connecting! 

Cheers, 

Bhumi Saxena

From: Bhumi Saxena

Subject: Followup Discussion Availability Request | TechnePlus

 

Hi Hagop,

 

Hope you're doing well!!

 

Last Thursday and Friday I tried multiple times your cell phone to connect with you. we would like to discuss more on the Boomi as platform and capabilities, we understand you been occupied. 

 

We realize our vision of Connected Systems, People, and Processes efficiently, empowering you to achieve new levels of excellence by combining our deep industry knowledge with the capabilities of Boomi. Our Integration Centre of Excellence (COE) is built on extensive experience and a solid foundation in best practices, allowing us to partner strategically with Boomi to deliver tangible business value. 

 

We can have a demo on your feasible time but would be great if we can connect once and get introduced, do help us with you calendar time. 

  

Looking forward to hear from you! 

Cheers, 

Bhumi Saxena

TechnePlus <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.techneplus.com%2Ft%2F110470%2Fsc%2Fffaa24dc-3829-4552-a788-06dfb3f16eda%2FNB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHIZLDNBXGK4DMOVZS4Y3PNU7XGYTSMM6TCLKSJUYS2MSJJZJDQM3RLBWG2MZZJRXG2NCREUZUIJJTIQSTENCFKVNEQRDJNBHUQN2SGRXHQV2JGFIXIVCFKESTGRBFGNCA%3D%3D%3D%3D%2FMFTDOOJYGAZGIN3FMIZDSNTBMFTGEMLCHE3DQNZXMJTDCMRUGM3WGMJXMU3GGNLC%2Fwww-techneplus-com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C04c97c674fc04d6a2fcb08dcdc776703%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627652631447640%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AzJbYZvAGmb2eY5ovvRamKnvNxj78LOe9wyW06v8Was%3D&reserved=0>  has expertise in Integration Excellence, M&A and Divestiture, Cloud Migration, Compliance, DevOps, Workflow, and ERP Modernization through Boomi Integration.    

 

Boomi's capabilities include seamless modernization, transformation, innovation, and data integration to help efficient application in higher education. We believe in making our client's lives easier and their businesses more efficient to connect everyone, anything, anywhere to the rapidly evolving challenges.

     

We would be happy to discuss your organization’s current and future needs. Please let me know your interest and availability for 20 –25 minutes next week.  

 

Looking forward to your response. 

 

Cheers, 

Bhumi Saxena 

Business Development Manager

I hope you have a great week ahead!

 

I want to draw your attention to TechnePlus <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.techneplus.com%2Ft%2F110470%2Fsc%2Fffaa24dc-3829-4552-a788-06dfb3f16eda%2FNB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHIZLDNBXGK4DMOVZS4Y3PNU7XGYTSMM6TCLKSJUYS2MSJJZJDQM3RLBWG2MZZJRXG2NCREUZUIJJTIQSTENCFKVNEQRDJNBHUQN2SGRXHQV2JGFIXIVCFKESTGRBFGNCA%3D%3D%3D%3D%2FMFTDOOJYGAZGIN3FMIZDSNTBMFTGEMLCHE3DQNZXMJTDCMRUGM3WGMJXMU3GGNLC%2Fwww-techneplus-com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C04c97c674fc04d6a2fcb08dcdc776703%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627652631497231%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=S8Zn3O4k7P4OrY1PtEQEXOn7qIc0PtQjNBAfUAAd3Eg%3D&reserved=0>  and Boomi's transformative capabilities. TechnePlus comes with a distinguished Integration COE boutique offerings/expertise, designed to improve efficiency, streamline operations, enhance data accuracy, and drive efficiency, with a proven success record. 

 

Why TechnePlus 

 

We have a proven and innovative approach towards integration COE delivery, ensuring:

 

Simplified Integration Process: A robust integration landscape, built through the right enterprise data integration solution, removes stress by helping organizations nimbly incorporate data, manage it, and use it for better reporting. 

 

Enhance Scalability and Flexibility: With the right architecture in place, future integrations are easier, and organizations can derive insight and value from data much more quickly

chunks.text:
Simplified Integration Process: A robust integration landscape, built through the right enterprise data integration solution, removes stress by helping organizations nimbly incorporate data, manage it, and use it for better reporting. 

 

Enhance Scalability and Flexibility: With the right architecture in place, future integrations are easier, and organizations can derive insight and value from data much more quickly 

 

Facilitates Real-time and Scheduled Data Integration: Bringing data together in a single interface assists with business development goals by clarifying market trends and shifts in demand. 

 

Rich experience in both Legacy and Advance Integration

 

Enable Business Process Automation: With event-based/scheduled automated data flows, the middle office can serve as process automation capability, optimizing the bottom line 

 

Success stories so far cover: 24 Happy Clients, with 45+ Discoveries, 65+ Projects, 1300+ integrations & 450+ connected systems, Delivered by a certified team of 65+ experts.

 

We believe that Boomi and our expertise can significantly enhance your business processes. We’d love to discuss how we can tailor our solutions to meet your needs and help your business grow.

Cheers,

Bhumi Saxena

Business Development Manager
